alert.note: Alert for Crisp; Schley; Sumter; Webster (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 2:51PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Webster, southeastern Schley, Sumter and northwestern Crisp Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 251 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Scrutchins, or 10 miles south of Americus, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Americus, Ellaville, Plains, Leslie, Andersonville, De Soto, Desoto, Cobb, Sumter, Lamar, Georgia Veterans Memorial St Pk, Croxton Crossroads, New Era, La Crosse, Huntington, Pennington, Maddox, Methvins, Bumphead and Centerpoint. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central and west central Georgia.
